message: I'm trying to build a package for my Django app Copyblock (https://github.com/sivy/django-copyblock) such that the package can live at http://pypi.python.org/pypi/django-copyblock but after installing, can be imported as "copyblock".
i can install via "pip install django-copyblock", but running "import copyblock" from the shell doesn't find the module.
You also don't need an __init__ file in your distribution folder, that could just throw off the find_packages util
a couple things - the name in your setup.py should just be copyblock - that is the module name - your distribution folder has the name django-copyblock
